class_notes: ENVS majors and minors will be prioritized during pre-registration, students should contact Leah Thomas leah.thomas@emory.edu for a permission number. Non-ENVS should contact Leah Thomas to be considered for any available spots during add/drop/swap.
course_description: Environmental issues that are often misunderstood can be communicated with effective writing and presentation methods. This class provides tools for addressing environmental misconceptions while also developing communication skills for a variety of personal, public, or academic situations.
prerequisites: ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in New Psyc Bldg 225 (36 Eagle Ro
sections: Class Nbr: 2361, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Open
